nodes.text: Velmor: Royalty and Rebellion was an online supplement for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game published on the Wizards of the Coast website in March 2003 as part of the site's Planet Hoppers series, featuring the planet Velmor and other characters and settings appearing in Marvel Comics' Star Wars series. It was written by Cory J. Herndon.
The supplement was split into four separate articles, including the reports and memoirs of Zeta Traal, Chozz Wardle, Debor Fyalko, and Ergric Betos.
